name: uts_sem5-workspace
description: Workspace runner to start Laravel, Express WebSocket and React dev server together

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd laravel && php artisan serve --host=127.0.0.1 --port=8000" "cd expressJS && npm run server:start" "cd reactjs && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: npm --prefix expressJS install && npm --prefix reactjs install && (cd laravel && echo 'Run composer install in laravel if needed')
